title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #107
body:
## Date and Time

April 25, 2023 at **14:00 UTC** [Please note the change of meeting time]

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- Cancun & Deneb upgrade
  - EOF Devnets Implementers Meeting [Recording 12](https://youtu.be/0Zqvs_d7vRw) 
  - EIP-4844 Implementers call 20 [Recording](https://youtu.be/oCqfxb5CWAI) 
  - [Preventing Slashed Validators from Becoming Block Proposers](https://etherworld.co/2023/04/24/preventing-slashed-validators-from-becoming-block-proposers/) & [Devnet 5 testing prep](https://etherworld.co/2023/04/20/eip-4844-devnet-5-testing-progress/)

### 2. Events, Fellowship, Hackathon
- [Next Billion Fellowship Cohort 3](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/03/16/fellowship-cohort-3-applications) - submit your application by April 28, 2023
- [ETHBoston](https://www.ethboston.xyz/) April 29-30, 2023
- [Coindesk's Consensus Protocol Village](https://consensus.coindesk.com/speakers/) April 26-28, 2023
- [Edcon](https://edcon.io/) MONTENEGRO - May 19-23, 2023

### 3. New initiative/association
- ERC-4337 Telegram integration
- ECH Website 
  - A page for Dencun
  - Opensource projects
- Splitting the ECH meeting video to create a general community update video and share it with the community
- Any new ideas for community engagement?

### 4. General updates/discussion
- [Devconnect - Istanbul](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/04/20/announcing-devconnect-ist) - November 13-19, 2023.
- Cancun - Deneb page at [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun_upgrade)
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6563 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 1880 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 3046 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 284 Followers
- ECH engineering
  - [EIPw](https://github.com/ethereum/eipw/issues)
- ECH Operations 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
   - [All Wallet Dev Meeting 11](https://youtu.be/JRmvcd2Ld50)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) & [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev Execution [Notes 159](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/761)
  - All Core Dev Consensus [Notes 107]
  - EIPIP [meeting 79](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/pull/230)
  - EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting 15 [Recording](https://youtube.com/live/GfoS-J-rTAw?feature=share) & Meeting 16 [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/228)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [106](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/pull/347)

#### The date for the next meeting is May 09, 2023

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)
